reviews.review: This is one of the best game in Steam. but right now there are a lot of cheaters playing this game right now. Pls fix

If you are into tactical team based shooters, this is the game for you. The only issue with it is valve does next to nothing to deal with cheaters in their own matchmaking. You basically have to use 3rd part matchmaking services to have an enjoyable experience, such as faceit or esea.
Норм игра для игры с друзьями
Best competitive shooter on the market
jogo muito bom e toxico ao mesmo tempo recomendo pra xingar a mae dos outro e ser o pai de alguem
Played a little bit, would recommend.

I seriously play the game way too much(so I've been told). This game is great, I literally play it almost everyday. I was never a PC gamer or gamer-in-general but since this game I have been getting more game than I have time to play! But ofc this is the game I still find myself hooked on. :)
top o jogo e vicia muito

Та самая контра, с веселым и бобящим комьюнити. 
Представьте игру где мало агро-школьников, мало читеров (что встречались они крайне редко) и стоящая небольших денег, а на распродажах так вообще копейки, да и деньги эти быстро отбивались если просто играть (выпадающий рандомный лут)

Так вот, это не та игра :)
